text: Max & the Midknights is a book series set in the Middle Ages, written by Lincoln Peirce. It is the first in a three-book series published by Crown Books for Young Readers. The book series has 3 books in it. Similarly to Big Nate, on November 16, 2021, Max & the Midknights was greenlit for an animated series on Nickelodeon, which premiered on November 2, 2024. Category:Series of books
title: Max & the Midknights
